snippet.title: Flow Based Programming with Elixir and ALF | Anton Mishchuk | Code BEAM Europe 2022
snippet.description:
This video was recorded at Code BEAM  Europe 2022 - https://codesync.global/conferences/code-beam-sto-2022/

Flow Based Programming with Elixir and ALF | Anton Mishchuk - Software Engineer

ABSTRACT
Flow-based Programming (FBP) is a 50-years-old idea of presenting an application as a network of independent processes (components) exchanging data via message passing. The Actor concurrency model in Erlang, GenServer abstraction, and powerful GenStage library make it extremely easy to implement FBP in Elixir. In the talk, I‚Äôm going to present the advantages of the approach for modelling the application layer of a program and provide examples using the ALF library I‚Äôve created.

OBJECTIVES
Discuss a new-old paradigm for creating software applications -a flow-based programming approach - and present a framework for supporting the approach.

AUDIENCE
Engineers who are interested in different approaches for writing software applications.

‚Ä¢ Timecodes
  00:00 - 09:15 - Flow-Based compony
  09:16 - 12:50 - FBP Advantages
  12:51 - 16:12 - FBP with Elixir
  16:13 - 19:50 - Meet ALF
  19:51 - 23:28 - ALF Components
  23:29 - 26:21 - Example: Online TicTacToe game
  26:22 - 34:16 - ALF Monitor
  34:17 - 41:31 - QnA

snippet.title: Jonas Gebhardt - Evolving the Visual Programming Environment with React at react-europe 2016
snippet.description: Tools shape our thinking. The "React Way" of thinking has already found many applications beyond building user interfaces. Particularly, React's functional, component-based design makes it an ideal candidate for building a better Visual Programming Environment. We'll examine how to overcome challenges such as lack of standardized APIs and limits of composition, and show how we can drastically improve the way humans create digital artifacts today.

snippet.title: Using ChatGPT to build System Diagrams
snippet.description:
üî•Best ChatGPT Courses for You
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT Complete Course: https://bit.ly/40rLDqO
‚û°Ô∏èPrompt Engineering for ChatGPT - https://bit.ly/44AxtGx
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT Masterclass:https://bit.ly/42Errnq
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT Complete Guide: Learn Midjourney, ChatGPT 4 & More - https://bit.ly/42Pugm3
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT Masterclass - Build Solutions and Apps with ChatGPT - https://bit.ly/3Zbjrrm
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT 101: Supercharge Your Work & Life (500+ Prompts inc) - https://bit.ly/3Z7pugw
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT for Programmers: Build Python Apps in Seconds - https://bit.ly/404ija9
‚û°Ô∏èChatGPT Masterclass: 2023 Passive Income W/ ChatGPT and AI - https://bit.ly/3LQ0Zl6

QUESTIONS ASKED IN THE COMMENTS HAVE BEEN ANSWERED HERE: https://youtu.be/xKywk7Bk5qg

This video discusses how ChatGPT, an OpenAI language model, can be used to generate system diagrams from text descriptions. By training ChatGPT on a dataset of system descriptions, the author was able to generate accurate representations of the systems in the form of diagrams. This approach could be useful for anyone needing to quickly generate system diagrams without the need for manual drawing or diagramming software.

I ask ChatGPT to define a use-case, create a data model, and generate class diagram, sequence diagram, and state transition diagram using markdown format for mermaid. ChatGPT provides helpful responses and even improves the state transition diagram to include additional states. While ChatGPT cannot create visual diagrams, it provides Mermaid syntax examples that can be used to create diagrams.

üëâüèª Mermaid: https://github.com/mermaid-js/mermaid

üëâüèª PROMPTS (used in this video):

1. Write a sample use case for a cafeteria management for employees. It should be well written, established, and easy to understand.
2.  Define data model for this use case.
3. Give data model in more detail with tabular format.
4.  Give Mermaid code for ERD for this use case.
5. Generate Mermaid code for sequence diagram for this use.
6. Can you generate Mermaid code for state transition diagram for payment of employees.
7. Give more detailed state transition diagram.
 
BONUS CONTENT:

üî•Make Teaching Easier with Artificial Intelligence (Chat GPT) - https://bit.ly/3lLOsEm

Thank You guys for watching! 

#chatgpt #openai #ai #artificialintelligence #softwareengineering #model #flowchart #diagram

snippet.title: Conversational ERP ‚Äì Lesson 1 ‚Äì What is ERP (15m)
snippet.description:
Looking for a step-by-step walk-through of an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution? 

In this video, Glen Moffatt (Director, Digital Core Field Enablement, North America, SAP) explains and demonstrates:
‚Ä¢ What is ERP
‚Ä¢ Business processes, such as Order-to-Cash and Procure-to-Pay
‚Ä¢ Conversational ERP


To learn more about SAP S/4HANA Cloud, look here: https://www.sap.com/products/s4hana-erp-cloud.html 
To learn more about ERP, look here: https://www.sap.com/products/what-is-erp.html
